var.name: forecast_hour
var.description: forecast time in 24-hour form

var.name: equation_of_time
var.description: equation of time

var.name: sine_of_solar_declination_angle
var.description: sine of solar declination angle

var.name: cosine_of_solar_declination_angle
var.description: cosine of solar declination angle

var.name: sine_of_latitude
var.description: sine of latitude

var.name: cosine_of_latitude
var.description: cosine of latitude

var.name: longitude_of_grid_point
var.description: longitude of grid point

var.name: cosine_of_zenith_angle
var.description: average of cosine of zenith angle over daytime shortwave call time interval

var.name: ground_surface_temperature
var.description: ground surface temperature

var.name: surface_midlayer_air_temperature
var.description: surface (first layer) air temperature

var.name: surface_midlayer_air_temperature_in_longwave_radiation
var.description: surface (first layer) air temperature saved in longwave radiation call

var.name: surface_longwave_emissivity
var.description: surface emissivity

var.name: downwelling_shortwave_flux_at_surface
var.description: total sky surface downward shortwave flux

var.name: net_shortwave_flux_into_ground_at_surface
var.description: total sky surface net shortwave flux into ground

var.name: downwelling_longwave_flux_at_surface
var.description: total sky surface downward longwave flux

var.name: tendency_of_air_temperature_due_to_shortwave_heating
var.description: total sky shortwave heating rate

var.name: tendency_of_air_temperature_due_to_shortwave_heating_assuming_clear_sky
var.description: clear sky shortwave heating rate

var.name: tendency_of_air_temperature_due_to_longwave_heating
var.description: total sky longwave heating rate

var.name: tendency_of_air_temperature_due_to_longwave_heating_assuming_clear_sky
var.description: clear sky longwave heating rates

var.name: direct_upwelling_near_infrared_shortwave_flux_at_surface
var.description: total sky surface near-infrared beam shortwave upward flux

var.name: diffuse_upwelling_near_infrared_shortwave_flux_at_surface
var.description: total sky surface near-infrared diffuse shortwave upward flux

var.description: total sky surface ultraviolet plus visible beam shortwave upward flux

var.description: total sky surface ultraviolet plus visible diffuse shortwave upward flux

var.description: total sky surface near-infrared beam shortwave downward flux

var.name: diffuse_downwelling_near_infrared_shortwave_flux_at_surface
var.description: total sky surface near-infrared diffuse shortwave downward flux

var.description: total sky surface ultraviolet plus visible beam shortwave downward flux

var.name: diffuse_downwelling_ultraviolet_and_visible_shortwave_flux_at_surface
var.description: total sky surface ultraviolet plus visible diffuse shortwave downward flux

var.name: horizontal_dimension
var.description: horizontal dimension

var.description: horizontal loop extent

var.name: vertical_dimension
var.description: number of vertical layers

var.description: model time-step-adjusted total radiation heating rate

var.description: model time-step-adjusted clear sky radiative (shortwave+longwave) heating rate

var.description: time-step-adjusted surface net shortwave flux into ground

var.description: time-step-adjusted surface downward longwave flux

var.name: upwelling_longwave_flux_at_surface
var.description: surface upward longwave flux at current time

var.name: time_step_zenith_angle_adjust_factor_for_sw
var.description: time-step zenith angle adjustment factor for shortwave

var.name: cosine_of_zenith_angle_at_current_time
var.description: cosine of zenith angle at current time step
